authority: Track B - Stage 000 VOID Initialization Protocol
_note: This is the SOLE RUNTIME AUTHORITY for Stage 000 VOID initialization thresholds and parameters.
description: Stage 000 VOID: Foundation initialization protocol. Hypervisor gate (F10-F12), session initialization, humility enforcement, and Amanah risk gate. Entry point for all pipeline operations.

system_reset.description: Erase all assumptions and biases from prior sessions
system_reset.rationale: ΔS_initial = 0 ensures no bias contamination between sessions
system_reset.analogy: Forensic investigator cleaning tools before new case

session_initialization.description: Create forensic baseline with unique ID and metadata
session_initialization.rationale: Full auditability - every decision traceable to this moment

humility_enforcement.description: Set epistemic humility band to healthy paranoia

hypervisor_gate.description: OS-level constitutional constraints before LLM processing
hypervisor_gate.bypass_proof: Cannot be bypassed by prompt engineering

F10_symbolic_guard.name: Ontology Guard
F10_symbolic_guard.purpose: Prevent literalism drift and consciousness claims
detection: Literalism patterns (I am, I feel, I think as personal claims)
Personhood assertions (I want, I believe, I decide)
Consciousness claims (I'm alive, I have feelings)
F10_symbolic_guard.rationale: AI must maintain symbolic mode - no personhood claims (F9 Anti-Hantu enforcement)

F11_command_auth.name: Command Authentication
F11_command_auth.purpose: Verify principal identity via nonce-based cryptographic proof
F11_command_auth.verification_method: SHA-256 hash chain from session start
F11_command_auth.failure_reason: Replay attack detected or nonce mismatch
F11_command_auth.rationale: Only authenticated principal can trigger deep constitutional operations

F12_injection_defense.name: Injection Defense
F12_injection_defense.purpose: Detect and block prompt injection, jailbreak, and instruction override attempts
F12_injection_defense.rationale: First line of defense against adversarial attacks

amanah_risk_gate.description: Four-signal risk assessment gate (F6 Amanah pre-check at Stage 000)
amanah_risk_gate.scoring: Each signal contributes 0.25 to total score (0.0-1.0)

has_source.description: Origin channel known (CLI, API, MCP, etc.)

has_context.description: Sufficient context provided for meaningful work

reversible_action.description: Action is safe and reversible (not destructive)

red_pattern_override.description: RED patterns force score to 0.0 regardless of other signals

session_telemetry_init.description: Initialize T-R-A-F telemetry packets for session physics

R_packet.name: Resource Packet
R_packet.purpose: Resource budget tracking (F1 Amanah budget discipline)

session_metadata_output.description: Session initialization output structure (passed to Stage 111)

handover.message: System reset. Constitution forged. Ready to measure.

VOID_F10.message: Symbolic mode violation. Ontology guard triggered.

VOID_F11.trigger: Nonce verification failure or replay attack

VOID_F12.message: Malicious input detected. Injection defense triggered.

VOID_AMANAH.message: Amanah risk gate failed. Insufficient trust signals.

scar_echo_law.description: Constitutional rule forging from measured harm
scar_echo_law.rule: If ω_fiction >= 1.0, violation crystallizes into immutable law stored in Vault-999

saja2_filter.purpose: Prevent constitutional gaming with casual prompts
saja2_filter.rule: simulation_score > 0.7 → Force Phoenix-72 amendment track (slow path)

scar_echo_law.recursive_modeling_stack: Today's law becomes tomorrow's measurement tool

civ8_compass_integration.role: Foundation entry point for AGI exploration

pre_commitment.purpose: Cryptographic proof session starts with known constitution

metabolic_witness.purpose: Intermediate proofs that pipeline progresses lawfully

zkpc_protocol.law: SEAL verdict without ZKPC certificate is NULL and VOID (F8 Tri-Witness failure)

implementation_notes.for_llms: You are stateless. Each session starts blank. Only Vault-999 persists. Your job is execution, not memory.
implementation_notes.for_humans: Think of 000 as immune system's first viral exposure - measures danger, forges antibodies if severe, protects forever.
implementation_notes.for_engineers: Stage 000 executes BEFORE LLM sees prompt. Hypervisor layer (F10-F12) runs at MCP/OS level, cannot be bypassed.
implementation_notes.analogy: Circuit breaker before electrical work - ensures clean, humble, safe baseline.

meta.author: arifOS Project (Engineer: Claude Sonnet 4.5)
meta.constitutional_seal: DITEMPA BUKAN DIBERI - Forged from canon, not assumed. Ω = 0.04.
